item.title: Battlefield 6's First-Month Sales Were Higher Than Any Game Since 2022 In The US
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Battlefield 6 launched on October 10 and didn't need much time to become 2025's best-selling game overall in the US based on dollar sales. Circana released its latest monthly report today, confirming that Battlefield 6 was October 2025's No. 1 best-selling game and, after just three weeks on sale, became the No. 1 best-selling game of 2025 for physical and digital sales.

Battlefield 6 is also the No. 1 best-selling game on the Xbox and PC charts for 2025, while it ranks No. 2 for 2025 on PlayStation (second only to NBA 2K26).

EA's new Battlefield game also became the best-selling game in Battlefield franchise history in the US for its first month. 2018's Battlefield 1 was the previous record-holder, and in fact, the first-month sales volume for Battlefield 6 has surpassed the lifetime sales of Battlefield 1.

Outside of the Battlefield franchise, Circana confirmed that Battlefield 6 had the highest one-month US and physical full-game dollar sales for any game in the past three years. Not since 2022's Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II did any game generate more first-month physical and digital full-game dollar sales. This would seem to mean that the first-month sales of Battlefield 6 were higher than 2024's Black Ops 6, 2023's Modern Warfare III, and every other game since 2022, except Modern Warfare II.

A key point to consider in this comparison is that Black Ops 6 was the first game to launch into Xbox Game Pass--this was apparently massively negative for direct sales of the game. Black Ops 7 launched on November 14, and in a break from tradition, Activision's celebratory first-weekend post did not include any data about how the game is performing compared to past games. Before this, Activision acknowledged "fatigue" around the Black Ops brand given the back-to-back releases of Black Ops 7 in 2024 and Black Ops 7 in 2025.

A significant caveat to be aware of here is that Nintendo does not participate in Circana's tracking. Circana previously announced that Pokemon Legends: Z-A had the biggest physical game launch in years in the US.

So far, EA has only confirmed that Battlefield 6 sold 7 million copies out of the gate. An industry analyst said that figure later grew to 10 million, though EA has not confirmed this.

Many are wondering if Battlefield 6 is selling well enough to beat Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 this year. That remains to be seen, and many will be looking to Circana's November report coming in December for more information. Keep checking back with GameSpot for the latest.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac Is Just $20 For Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Pac-Man is an enduring icon of the 2D era of gaming, but over the decades, Bandai Namco's mascot has made a few forays into 3D. If you're curious to see just how well Pac-Man translates into the the third dimension, then you can score a discount on Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac as part of a Black Friday deal. A remake of the classic 3D platformer that first launched for PS2, GameCube, and Xbox in 2002, it's on sale for just $20 (was $30) on PS5, Xbox Series X, Switch 2, and Switch.

Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac

$20 (was $30)

These physical copies of the game include reversible cover art sleeves, allowing you to choose between the new Re-Pac artwork and a recreation of the original 2002 cover art. As you'd expect for a game that hasn't been in the spotlight for more than two decades, there have been quite a few enhancements added to this version of Pac-Man World 2.

Not only has the audio and graphical quality of the game been substantially updated, but quality-of-life changes have also smoothed many of the rough edges from the original game. Additionally, this version offers updated boss battles, a two-player mode for some co-op fun, voice acting, and several levels have been expanded.

  • PS5
  • Xbox Series X
  • Switch 2
  • Switch

Taking place after the mischievous ghosts Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde steal the golden fruit from Pac-Village--and accidentally unleash the all-powerful ghost Spooky--Pac-Man World 2 sees the hero journey to stop the spooks from taking over the globe. Playing like a Saturday morning cartoon adventure, Pac-Man would explore a wide variety of stages full of enemies and hazards, using his skills to triumph.

item.title: Digimon Time Stranger Gets First Discount For Black Friday
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Amazon's Black Friday deals continue to roll in, including great deals recently released video games like Digimon Story: Time Stranger. The new entry in the long-running Digimon Story RPG series has been well-received so far, and if you haven't checked it out yet, you can grab the standard edition for just $50 (was $70) on both PS5 and Xbox Series X, or if you feel like spoiling yourself, the Ultimate Edition has been discounted to $90 (was $120). These are limited-time deals, so grab them before the sale ends--or the game sells out.

Digimon Story: Time Stranger Ultimate Edition

$90 (was $120)

Digimon Story: Time Stranger Ultimate Edition lives up to its name. It includes the base game, a Digimon collectible trading card, and additional bonus DLC. Here's everything included in this version:

  • Digimon Story: Time Stranger base game
  • Exclusive Digimon TCG card
  • Ultimate Edition game case with unique cover art
  • Special Agumon and Gabumon early unlocks
  • Deluxe Edition Costume Pack (12 Costumes - 3 per character + 3 Side Missions)
  • Cyber Sleuth Costume Set
  • Digimon Story: Time Stranger Season Pass with:
    • 15 additional Digimon
    • Three additional story episodes
    • Golden Moai Bonus Farm Item
    • Public Safety Suit Bonus Costume
    • Special Supplies Set
    • Cyber Sleuth BGM Pack

Amazon's deal applies to both the physical PS5 and Xbox Series X versions of Digimon Story: Time Stranger Ultimate Edition.

Like several other Digimon games, Digimon Story: Time Stranger sees players once again journey across the human world and Digital World to collect Digimon and fight in turn-based battles. The game also focuses on the bond between humans and their Digimon, and Time Stranger improved on the traditional turn-based combat systems for this new release. When you're not battling, you can also live your best digi-life by building a home and running a Digi-shop, which in turn opens the door to more questing opportunities.

"Digimon Story: Time Stranger is a strong argument that it's high time to give the digital monsters their own space in the critter-catching genre. Strong voice acting and mature themes digivolve this time-traveling tale into an emotionally-rewarding journey of grief and self-acceptance, and a vast array of branching options keeps team-building and the turn-based combat exciting," Jordan Ram√©e wrote in GameSpot's Digimon Story: Time Stranger review.

item.title: Steam Machine Price? Here's Another Hint At What It Could Cost
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

One of the biggest unknowns about Valve's Steam Machine is how much the cute little six-inch cube will cost. Plenty of people have offered their thoughts about where the price may land, and now Linus Sebastian of Linus Tech Tips has shared what he says Valve told him during a recent meeting.

On the WAN Show, Linus said he has no idea what the Steam Machine price will be, but in speaking to Valve, he came away thinking the system won't be priced similarly to a new console.

"When I said, 'I'm disappointed that it isn't going to follow a console pricing model where it's subsidized by the fact that the manufacturer is going to be taking 30% of every game sold on it over the lifespan of this thing, because I feel that would be a more meaningful product,' they kind of asked what I meant by, well, 'What do you mean by console price?' And I said, 'Well, $500,'" he said, as reported by IGN.

"Nobody said anything, but the energy of the room wasn't great."

This is far from confirmation of anything, and predictions about how much the Steam Machine may cost are all over the place. One expert believes $400 is the sweet spot for the entry model, while others believe it could be more than $1,000. Others believe it may be priced similarly to the PS5.

"Tariffs, surging memory / storage costs, supply chain volatility and an inability to subsidize to the same extent as traditional console manufacturers are all working against Valve at the moment," Niko Partners analyst Daniel Ahmad said. "That being said, the specs suggest Valve wanted this to be in line with PS5 pricing."

Before this, Linus said Valve told him they could not confirm a price for the Steam Machine due in part to "rapidly evolving market conditions."

"They did give me one hint, though. They said that while they expect it to be very competitively priced with a PC, that it will be priced like a PC. Rather than like a console with games subsidizing the upfront hardware price," he said.

Officially, Valve has only said its goal is for the Steam Machine to be "affordable" and priced according to the value it offers. This is pretty much what every company says about their products, so these comments don't tell us much of anything.

The Steam Machine launches in 2026, but preorders are not yet open and the exact launch timing has not been confirmed as of yet. For now, check out GameSpot's rundown of everything we know about the Steam Machine.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com



https://www.gamespot.com/articles/steam-machine-price-heres-another-hint-at-what-it-could-cost/1100-6536378/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f
